nestjs.files.include.description: Glob patterns to include in the package. The default is ts, html, css, scss, less.

nestjs.files.exclude.description: Glob patterns to exclude from the package. The default is node_modules, dist, out, build, and any hidden files.

nestjs.files.watch.description: The list of directories to watch for changes. The default is controllers, dtos, and services.

nestjs.files.autoImport.description: Automatically import the generated file in the module. The default is true.
